refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: In a MsgSet, each MsgEntry contains at least one Msg. A Msg consists of a main message (MsgMain), and optionally one or more submessages (MsgSub) or related messages (MsgRel).
Additional information or explanation for the message is contained in the siblings of Msg within the MsgEntry.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: On the whole, the semantics of MsgSet are not clearly defined.
